name: MongoDB Enterprise V-81895
title: A mongod or mongos running with "security.redactClientLogData"
script:
redactClientLogData="redactClientLogData"
checkfile="/etc/mongod.conf"
if [ -f $checkfile ]
then
   log=$(grep -i "${redactClientLogData}" "${checkfile}" | grep -Ev "#" | grep -i "true")

 
   if [ -z "$log" ]
   then
      echo "Can't find $redactClientLogData within $checkfile or it is not set to true"
      exit 1
    else
      echo "$redactClientLogData exist and is set to true within $checkfile"
      exit 0
    fi
    else
      echo "$checkfile does not exist"
      exit 1
    fi
